module.name: Wake Up Calls
module.description: FreePBX module for generating reminder and wakeup calls
module.changelog: *13.0.7* minor fix for 24 hour time at 1300 *13.0.6* FREEPBX-10101 Display system time in wakeup calls *13.0.5* FREEPBX-9980 better notices when input is wrong, FREEPBX-9981 remove bootnav, not needed here *13.0.4* FREEPBX-9912 Localize sound playback for hotelwakeup *13.0.3* FREEPBX-9841 addresses problems, uses new functionality, adds ability to list and manage multiple calls *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha3* Actually work *13.0.1alpha2* More Visual changes *13.0.1alpha1* Visual Styling Fixes *2.11.3* Fixes outstanding database issues *2.11.2* Database abstraction layer fixes *2.11.1* #7011 fix errors in hotel wakeup *2.11.0.0beta2* Removed online check for updates for POSSA *2.11.0.0beta1* imported from web to online repo
